headers.value: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' plausible.io www.googletagmanager.com www.google-analytics.com assets.calendly.com; connect-src 'self' plausible.io https://formspree.io https://api.formspree.io www.google-analytics.com; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' fonts.googleapis.com assets.calendly.com; img-src 'self' data: https:; font-src 'self' fonts.gstatic.com; frame-src 'self' calendly.com www.youtube-nocookie.com; object-src 'none'
